properties.entry: INSERT INTO BOARD(BRD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, MEM_NO, BRD_TYPE) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT * FROM V_REVIEW WHERE BRD_NO = ? AND BRD_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BRD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V_REVIEW WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT RNUM, TITLE, N_NM, BRD_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM(SELECT * FROM V_REVIEW WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC) V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM IMAGE WHERE BRD_NO IN (SELECT BRD_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, V.* FROM(SELECT * FROM V_REVIEW WHERE BRD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC) V) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND FILE_LEVEL = 0
UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = ?, CONTENT = ?, BRD_MODIFY = SYSDATE WHERE BRD_NO = ?
UPDATE ADT_REVIEW SET ADT_DATE = ?, ADT_LINK = ? WHERE BRD_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NUMBER, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, BRD_NO FROM IMAGE WHERE BRD_NO = ?
